Class AggSvcGroupByAccessOnlyImpl

java.lang.Object
  com.espertech.esper.epl.agg.service.AggSvcGroupByAccessOnlyImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AggregationResultFuture, AggregationService
public class AggSvcGroupByAccessOnlyImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements AggregationService, AggregationResultFuture

Aggregation service for use when only first/last/window aggregation functions are used an none other.
